# ğŸ’° Finance Assistant Help Guide

I'm your personal finance chatbot, here to help you manage your money effectively!

## ğŸ“ Core Features

### ğŸ§¾ Track Expenses
* Record daily spending: "I spent RM25 on lunch"

### ğŸ“Š View Your Spending
* Recent history: "Show my recent expenses"

### ğŸ’¼ Budget Management

### ğŸ¯ Goals Management

### ğŸ’¡ Financial Insights

## ğŸš€ Quick Examples
